tomcarter.bombero.game.logic.world

Class WorldController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tomcarter.bombero.game.logic.world.WorldController

  • public class WorldController
extends java.lang.Object
    World controller Holds game specific data as score, lives left... updates level alters game state - reload / load of levels

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      WorldController()
      Starts new game - level 1
      WorldController(LevelType levelType)
      Starts game with specific level
